author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
90x PR: Updated L1TGlobalUtil to now also access L1T prescales from payloads, using GlobalTag. Replace https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17512, and backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17721 Example: 
cmsRun L1Trigger/L1TGlobal/test/runGTSummary.py
title: Pr90x l1t prescales from payloads - bis
